title: Felidae
creator_credit: Vanessa White, Sarah Watt and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
brief_description: This hand-drawn animation tells the story of two people’s sightings of a big-cat or panther in the Dandenongs of Melbourne. The visuals accompanying the voice-overs serve to add to the story in more abstract terms with painted film and iconic images of panthers intermixed with the voices.
